name: BREAKTHROUGH ENERGY, LLC
description: Encourages development of new technologies&policies to speed innovation from lab to market
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to energy innovation, research & development, industrial decarbonization and decarbonization of liquid fuels.
Issues related to decarbonizing liquid fuels in the transportation sector.
Issues related to the investment in research, development, deployment of clean energy technologies.
